Definition: This task is about locating the pronoun in the given input statement

Positive Examples.input: The user changed his password from GrWQWu8JyC toÂ willow-towered Canopy Huntertropic wrestles as it was easy to remember.

Positive Examples.input: During a game of tag, Ethan ran from Luke because he was it.

Negative Examples.input: Madonna fired her trainer because she couldnt stand her boyfriend.

Negative Examples.input: This book introduced Shakespeare to Ovid; it was a fine selection of his writing.
